00260 
00266 enum L4_task_ops
00267 {
00268   L4_TASK_MAP_OP         = 0UL,    
00269   L4_TASK_UNMAP_OP       = 1UL,    
00270   L4_TASK_CAP_INFO_OP    = 2UL,    
00271   L4_TASK_ADD_KU_MEM_OP  = 3UL,    
00272   L4_TASK_LDT_SET_X86_OP = 0x11UL, 
00273 };
00274 
00275 
00276 /* IMPLEMENTATION -----------------------------------------------------------*/
00277 
00278 #include <l4/sys/ipc.h>
00279 
00280 
00281 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00282 l4_task_map_u(l4_cap_idx_t dst_task, l4_cap_idx_t src_task,
00283               l4_fpage_t const snd_fpage, unsigned long snd_base, l4_utcb_t *u) L4_NOTHROW
00284 {
00285   l4_msg_regs_t *v = l4_utcb_mr_u(u);
00286   v->mr[0] = L4_TASK_MAP_OP;
00287   v->mr[3] = l4_map_obj_control(0,0);
00288   v->mr[4] = l4_obj_fpage(src_task, 0, L4_FPAGE_RWX).raw;
00289   v->mr[1] = snd_base;
00290   v->mr[2] = snd_fpage.raw;
00291   return l4_ipc_call(dst_task, u, l4_msgtag(L4_PROTO_TASK, 3, 1, 0), L4_IPC_NEVER);
00292 }
00293 
00294 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00295 l4_task_unmap_u(l4_cap_idx_t task, l4_fpage_t const fpage,
00296                 unsigned long map_mask, l4_utcb_t *u) L4_NOTHROW
00297 {
00298   l4_msg_regs_t *v = l4_utcb_mr_u(u);
00299   v->mr[0] = L4_TASK_UNMAP_OP;
00300   v->mr[1] = map_mask;
00301   v->mr[2] = fpage.raw;
00302   return l4_ipc_call(task, u, l4_msgtag(L4_PROTO_TASK, 3, 0, 0), L4_IPC_NEVER);
00303 }
00304 
00305 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00306 l4_task_unmap_batch_u(l4_cap_idx_t task, l4_fpage_t const *fpages,
00307                       unsigned num_fpages, unsigned long map_mask,
00308                       l4_utcb_t *u) L4_NOTHROW
00309 {
00310   l4_msg_regs_t *v = l4_utcb_mr_u(u);
00311   v->mr[0] = L4_TASK_UNMAP_OP;
00312   v->mr[1] = map_mask;
00313   __builtin_memcpy(&v->mr[2], fpages, num_fpages * sizeof(l4_fpage_t));
00314   return l4_ipc_call(task, u, l4_msgtag(L4_PROTO_TASK, 2 + num_fpages, 0, 0), L4_IPC_NEVER);
00315 }
00316 
00317 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00318 l4_task_cap_valid_u(l4_cap_idx_t task, l4_cap_idx_t cap, l4_utcb_t *u) L4_NOTHROW
00319 {
00320   l4_msg_regs_t *v = l4_utcb_mr_u(u);
00321   v->mr[0] = L4_TASK_CAP_INFO_OP;
00322   v->mr[1] = cap & ~1UL;
00323   return l4_ipc_call(task, u, l4_msgtag(L4_PROTO_TASK, 2, 0, 0), L4_IPC_NEVER);
00324 }
00325 
00326 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00327 l4_task_cap_has_child_u(l4_cap_idx_t task, l4_cap_idx_t cap, l4_utcb_t *u) L4_NOTHROW
00328 {
00329   l4_msg_regs_t *v = l4_utcb_mr_u(u);
00330   v->mr[0] = L4_TASK_CAP_INFO_OP;
00331   v->mr[1] = cap | 1UL;
00332   return l4_ipc_call(task, u, l4_msgtag(L4_PROTO_TASK, 2, 0, 0), L4_IPC_NEVER);
00333 }
00334 
00335 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00336 l4_task_cap_equal_u(l4_cap_idx_t task, l4_cap_idx_t cap_a,
00337                     l4_cap_idx_t cap_b, l4_utcb_t *u) L4_NOTHROW
00338 {
00339   l4_msg_regs_t *v = l4_utcb_mr_u(u);
00340   v->mr[0] = L4_TASK_CAP_INFO_OP;
00341   v->mr[1] = cap_a;
00342   v->mr[2] = cap_b;
00343   return l4_ipc_call(task, u, l4_msgtag(L4_PROTO_TASK, 3, 0, 0), L4_IPC_NEVER);
00344 }
00345 
00346 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00347 l4_task_add_ku_mem_u(l4_cap_idx_t task, l4_fpage_t const ku_mem,
00348                      l4_utcb_t *u) L4_NOTHROW
00349 {
00350   l4_msg_regs_t *v = l4_utcb_mr_u(u);
00351   v->mr[0] = L4_TASK_ADD_KU_MEM_OP;
00352   v->mr[1] = ku_mem.raw;
00353   return l4_ipc_call(task, u, l4_msgtag(L4_PROTO_TASK, 2, 0, 0), L4_IPC_NEVER);
00354 }
00355 
00356 
00357 
00358 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00359 l4_task_map(l4_cap_idx_t dst_task, l4_cap_idx_t src_task,
00360             l4_fpage_t const snd_fpage, unsigned long snd_base) L4_NOTHROW
00361 {
00362   return l4_task_map_u(dst_task, src_task, snd_fpage, snd_base, l4_utcb());
00363 }
00364 
00365 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00366 l4_task_unmap(l4_cap_idx_t task, l4_fpage_t const fpage,
00367               unsigned long map_mask) L4_NOTHROW
00368 {
00369   return l4_task_unmap_u(task, fpage, map_mask, l4_utcb());
00370 }
00371 
00372 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00373 l4_task_unmap_batch(l4_cap_idx_t task, l4_fpage_t const *fpages,
00374                     unsigned num_fpages, unsigned long map_mask) L4_NOTHROW
00375 {
00376   return l4_task_unmap_batch_u(task, fpages, num_fpages, map_mask,
00377                                l4_utcb());
00378 }
00379 
00380 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00381 l4_task_delete_obj_u(l4_cap_idx_t task, l4_cap_idx_t obj,
00382                      l4_utcb_t *u) L4_NOTHROW
00383 {
00384   return l4_task_unmap_u(task, l4_obj_fpage(obj, 0, L4_CAP_FPAGE_RWSD),
00385                          L4_FP_DELETE_OBJ, u);
00386 }
00387 
00388 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00389 l4_task_delete_obj(l4_cap_idx_t task, l4_cap_idx_t obj) L4_NOTHROW
00390 {
00391   return l4_task_delete_obj_u(task, obj, l4_utcb());
00392 }
00393 
00394 
00395 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00396 l4_task_release_cap_u(l4_cap_idx_t task, l4_cap_idx_t cap,
00397                       l4_utcb_t *u) L4_NOTHROW
00398 {
00399   return l4_task_unmap_u(task, l4_obj_fpage(cap, 0, L4_CAP_FPAGE_RWSD),
00400                          L4_FP_ALL_SPACES, u);
00401 }
00402 
00403 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00404 l4_task_release_cap(l4_cap_idx_t task, l4_cap_idx_t cap) L4_NOTHROW
00405 {
00406   return l4_task_release_cap_u(task, cap, l4_utcb());
00407 }

00410 l4_task_cap_valid(l4_cap_idx_t task, l4_cap_idx_t cap) L4_NOTHROW
00411 {
00412   return l4_task_cap_valid_u(task, cap, l4_utcb());
00413 }
00414 
00415 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00416 l4_task_cap_has_child(l4_cap_idx_t task, l4_cap_idx_t cap) L4_NOTHROW

00420 
00421 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00422 l4_task_cap_equal(l4_cap_idx_t task, l4_cap_idx_t cap_a,
00423                   l4_cap_idx_t cap_b) L4_NOTHROW
00424 {
00425   return l4_task_cap_equal_u(task, cap_a, cap_b, l4_utcb());
00426 }

00428 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00429 l4_task_add_ku_mem(l4_cap_idx_t task, l4_fpage_t const ku_mem) L4_NOTHROW
00430 {
00431   return l4_task_add_ku_mem_u(task, ku_mem, l4_utcb());
